name: brvblade
story: Brave Blade is an extremely cool shoot 'em up with vertical scrolling from 8ing/Raizing. Medieval living weapons capable of transforming into a mesh, the Runeswords, are fighting without mercy. Play as one of them and go to battle. Your character can at any time turn into a robot to attack melee and tap into a gauge to create a shield or even become invincible. Master all these techniques to get you out in this shoot 'em up with 3D graphics.
